name: Tap Balls
description:
Fantastic balls game!

HOW TO PLAY:
1. Click balls with same color to eliminate.
2. All balls eliminated will enter next stage.
3. Eliminate single one ball will cost you a magic stick. You are given 5 sticks at the start of one game.
4. Game is over when there is no sticks. Get as high score as you can.
5. BOMB power up will help you explode 3x3 balls.

HD graphics will makes you love it!

Good luck and have fun!
